comments.body: Is this necessary? Sounds good for the release version, but I am not sure I like it in the dev version, for all I see maybe they should also be an error like Deprecation warning in the dev version?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +378,382 @@            warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", message="numpy.ufunc size changed")
            warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", category=ModuleDeprecationWarning)
            warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", category=FutureWarning)

            from .noseclasses import NumpyTestProgram
